title: Welcoming the HOF Class of 2026: Why Carlos Beltran and Andruw Jones got in
content: Cooperstown welcomed two new players Tuesday night. Here's why the center fielders are headed to the Hall.

title: Buccaneers hire ex-Falcon Robinson as new OC
content: The Buccaneers have hired Zac Robinson as their offensive coordinator, bringing in the former Falcons OC to lead an offense that ranked 21st in total offense this season.

title: 'What was that for?' Osaka asks of terse Cirstea
content: Naomi Osaka received a cool response from Sorana Cirstea after their second-round Australian Open match. Osaka said Cirstea was apparently upset with Osaka's efforts to pump herself up during the match.

title: McCaffrey, 4 QBs named AP NFL MVP finalists
content: Christian McCaffrey has become only the second player to be a finalist for three AP NFL awards in the same year, joining Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, Drake Maye and Matthew Stafford in the running for The AP 2025 NFL Most Valuable Player award.

title: Vonn, Kim on Olympic team; Anderson falls short
content: Two-time Olympic gold medalist Jamie Anderson was notably absent from a U.S. Ski & Snowboard roster that was headlined by Olympic veterans Lindsey Vonn, Mikaela Shiffrin and Chloe Kim.

title: GM Lynch: Aiyuk has played last snap for 49ers
content: At Wednesday's end-of-season news conference, 49ers general manager John Lynch confirmed what has been obvious for months: WR Brandon Aiyuk will not return to the only NFL team he has ever known.

title: Niners' injury probe includes looking into substation
content: Niners GM John Lynch said the team will look into "everything" to find out why injuries continue to pile up year after year, including an investigation into the viral electrical substation conspiracy theory.

title: Mets strike again, add ace Peralta from Brewers
content: The Mets' winterlong pursuit of a front-line starting pitcher ended with them acquiring All-Star Freddy Peralta and right-hander Tobias Myers from the Brewers for prospects Brandon Sproat and Jett Williams.

title: Giannis cites chemistry, selfish play after routs
content: Giannis Antetokounmpo says chemistry issues might be contributing to the Bucks' recent penchant for lopsided losses.

content: Wetzel: The NCAA needs Congress to give it a skinny exemption to at least set some eligibility standards.

content: Puka Nacua's elite performance can be attributed to the mentorship of veteran receivers Cooper Kupp and Davante Adams.

content: Steve Kerr and Steve Nash own Mallorca with a former USMNT international and an ex-tennis pro. What has it taught them about sport, leadership and life?

content: Arsenal are still top of the Champions League table, and likely to remain there, but the fight for a bye to the round of 16 is shaping up to be fierce.

content: The 2026 WNBA schedule is out and teams announced their calendar in their own creative ways on social media.

content: The Big Ten and Big 12 are winners as Ohio State, Iowa and Baylor crack the top 10. UConn stays No. 1.

content: Results Sunday and Monday shook up the top 16, and the Buckeyes benefited the most, climbing two seed lines.

content: Eric Karabell forecasts what to expect from notable players such as Cooper Flagg, Jalen Green, Jonathan Kuminga and more.

content: Who has the edge in the first UFC event of 2026? Four former UFC fighters make their picks for the UFC 324 main event.

title: MMA Rank 50-1: Which stars could shine the brightest in 2026?
content: Makhachev, Topruia or Chimaev? ESPN ranks the top 50 fighters in MMA based on how they will perform in 2026.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United, Chelsea want Dortmund's Felix Nmecha
content: Dortmund midfielder Felix Nmecha is attracting interest from Manchester United and Chelsea. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Beyond Ikkis, Border 2 - The Lesser-Known Story Of A Two-Time War Veteran
content: This month has seen the release of two Hindi films, Ikkis and Border 2, both dedicated to the Indian officers and soldiers who participated in the Battle of Basantar against Pakistan in 1971.

title: PM Modi Speaks To Brazilian President, Reviews Strong Momentum In Ties
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva on Thursday and asserted that close cooperation was vital for advancing the shared interests of the Global South.

title: On Camera, Masked Men Kidnap Woman From Busy Gwalior Neighbourhood
content: A woman was kidnapped by masked men in broad daylight from Dal Bazaar, one of Gwalior's most crowded and commercially active areas. The brazen crime, captured on a nearby CCTV camera, has now surfaced and sent shockwaves across the city.

title: 'Peace Or Piece Of Greenland?' Musk Takes Dig At Trump's New Gaza Board
content: Tech billionaire Elon Musk, who joined BlackRock CEO Larry Fink on a panel at the World Economic Forum (WEF) in Davos, took a dig at US President Donald Trump's 'Board of Peace'.

title: Andhra Woman Fed Husband Biryani, Smothered Him. Watched Porn Next To Body
content: A woman in Andhra Pradesh's Guntur district made biryani for her husband. The key ingredient was powdered sleeping pills. After the husband slipped into a slumber, the woman called her lover to the house, before the pair smothered the man to death.

title: Probe Agency ED Attaches Fresh Rs 20 Crore Assets In Karnataka MUDA Case
content: The Enforcement Directorate on Thursday said it has attached fresh assets worth more than Rs 20 crore as part of its probe into the MUDA-linked money laundering case in Karnataka.

title: 'Beautiful Property': US Lays Out Plan For 'New Gaza' With Focus On Tourism
content: US officials on Thursday presented their vision for a "New Gaza" that would turn the shattered Palestinian territory into a glitzy resort of skyscrapers by the sea, saying the transformation could emerge in three years.

title: First Russia-US-Ukraine Trilateral To Be Held In UAE From Tomorrow: Zelensky
content: A trilateral meeting at the technical level between Ukraine, US and Russia is set to be held on January 23 and 24 in the United Arab Emirates.

title: Actor Alleges Music Composer Palash Muchhal Cheated Him Of Rs 40 Lakh
content: A 34-year-old actor and producer has approached police in Maharashtra's Sangli district alleging that he was cheated by composer and filmmaker Palash Muchhal of Rs 40 lakh, police said on Thursday.

title: 'No Nuclear Threat During Operation Sindoor': Nuclear Watchdog Chief To NDTV
content: The head of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA), Rafael Mariano Grossi, has stated that there was no indication of any involvement of nuclear weapons during the India-Pakistan conflict in 2025.

title: Crackdown On Fake Disability Papers Creates Ripples In Maharashtra
content: In a major crackdown on a racket of issuing fake disability certificates, the primary education department of the Nanded zilla parishad has suspended seven teachers in the first phase of its disciplinary action.

title: No Snow, Forest Fire Rages For 2 Days Near China Border In Sikkim
content: The latest blaze has spread across the left side of the valley and continues to advance towards the right side, which falls under a restricted Army zone.

title: 60-year-old Man's Torso, Head Found Lying Side By Side In Odisha: Cops
content: The torso and head of a 60-year-old man were found lying on a village road in Odisha's Jajpur district on Thursday, police said.

title: Adani Total Gas Reports 10% Rise In Q3 Net Profit
content: Adani Total Gas Ltd, the city gas joint venture of Adani Group and France's TotalEnergies, on Thursday reported a 10 per cent rise in its third quarter net profit as higher CNG sales helped offset a rise in prices of input raw material.

title: KTR Summoned In Phone-Tapping Case, Says Probe Is "Time-Pass Exercise"
content: The Special Investigation Team (SIT) has issued a notice to former minister and BRS working president KT Rama Rao (KTR) in connection with the phone-tapping case.

title: "1st Victory, Divine Prelude": Actor Vijay On Whistle Symbol For His Party
content: Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK) chief and actor Vijay today welcomed the Election Commission's allotment of the whistle as his party's official election symbol, calling it TVK's "first victory" and a "divine prelude" to electoral success.

title: "I'm Victim Of Gandhi Siblings' Rift": Himanta Sarma's Bombshell In Davos
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has alleged cracks between the Gandhi siblings, ripping into the top Gandhi family members during his Davos debut.

title: Told IndiGo To Dismiss Senior Vice President: Centre To Delhi High Court
content: The government today told the Delhi High Court that it asked IndiGo to dismiss its senior vice president following the massive disruption in flights in December last year due to inefficient planning.

title: Girl, 11, Raped In Delhi, Left In Forest Area By E-Rickshaw Driver: Cops
content: An 11-year-old girl, selling roses at traffic signals in central Delhi, was kidnapped, raped and left unconscious in a forest area by an e-rickshaw driver, police said on Thursday.

title: Pakistan backs Trump‚Äôs Gaza ‚ÄòBoard of Peace‚Äô ‚Äî why it‚Äôs a complicated fit
content: Pakistan has formally backed Donald Trump's Gaza "Board of Peace", unveiled in Davos, placing it closer to a US-led post-war framework for Gaza. This move, contrasting with India's abstention and European nations' opt-out, raises questions about potential troop contributions to an International Stabilisation Force, despite domestic political and economic challenges.

title: 'Not just vandalism‚Äô: Statue damaged at Hindu temple in US, probe under way
content: A sacred guardian statue at the Sri Venkateswara Temple in Cary, North Carolina, was vandalized on January 18.  Hindu advocacy groups are condemning the act as an attack on their community, urging a thorough investigation into potential bias. Police are reviewing surveillance footage, and restoration efforts are underway, with no arrests made yet.

title: Bangladesh says ICC, Indian govt made 'no effort' to reassure on security
content: Bangladesh sports advisor Asif Nazrul said the ICC and the BCCI failed to convince the BCB that adequate security would be provided for Bangladesh players, journalists and supporters during the tournament, which will be hosted in India and Sri Lanka.

title: OpenAI concerns: Google AI CEO on Sam Altman; ‚ÄòMaybe he‚Äôs realised what everyone is worried about‚Äô
content: Google AI CEO Demis Hassabis stated no plans for ads in Gemini, deeming OpenAI's ChatGPT ad test a premature revenue push. This comes amid investor concerns about OpenAI's significant spending exceeding revenue, with projections of substantial cumulative losses and unsustainable operational costs for its AI tools.

title: Middle East $50 Billion Round: OpenAI seeks new funding amid crisis; Noble warns of chaos
content: OpenAI is reportedly seeking a massive $50 billion investment from Middle Eastern funds amidst growing concerns about its financial stability and competitive edge. Veteran investor George Noble warns the AI giant is "falling apart in real time," citing internal "Code Red" alerts, declining ChatGPT traffic, and staggering losses.  Talent departures and a lawsuit from Elon Musk further compound these issues.

title: Don't air internal issues in public: Congress warns Punjab leaders
content: Congress has issued a strong directive to its Punjab leaders, demanding an end to public displays of internal discord and factionalism. Party president Mallikarjun Kharge and Rahul Gandhi emphasized unity for the 2027 assembly elections, assuring no immediate leadership changes. Leaders must raise concerns internally, not through media, to present a united front for victory.

title: Pune Grand Tour | 'Never seen such a big crowd': How India and Indians embrace cycling
content: Massive crowds, curiosity and warmth defined the Pune Grand Tour as India embraced elite international cycling with rare fervour. From Saswad to Baramati, spectators lined roads normally meant for everyday life, leaving visiting teams stunned by the turnout and hospitality. Beyond results and jerseys, the inaugural race revealed India‚Äôs untapped appetite for global sporting spectacles.

title: Golden Dome: Trump's Greenland U-turn & the ‚Äòframework deal‚Äô ‚Äî 10 things to know
content: US President Trump claims a framework deal on Arctic sovereignty and tariffs with Nato chief Rutte, sparking confusion. Denmark and Greenland deny any Nato mandate for such talks. The proposed deal involves US military bases with limited sovereignty and a missile defence system, aiming to counter Russia and China's influence.

title: Workplace shake-up: Deloitte to rename job titles for thousands in the US; ‚ÄòLeader‚Äô roles added
content: Deloitte is overhauling job titles for all 181,500 US employees starting June 1, 2026, as part of a modernization drive influenced by AI. The consulting giant aims to better align roles with evolving client demands and employee career aspirations. New senior leadership designations will also be introduced, promising greater clarity and market relevance across all divisions.

title: Ryan Coogler‚Äôs 'Sinners' makes history with 16 nominations at the 98th Academy Awards
content: In a groundbreaking achievement, Ryan Coogler's 'Sinners,' a vampire thriller featuring Michael B. Jordan, has dominated the 98th Academy Awards with an unprecedented 16 nominations. The film is making waves in major categories like Best Picture and Best Director, surpassing all previous records and marking a monumental milestone for the film industry and its visionary creators.

title: 'Is CM so helpless': HC raps Maharashtra govt; Sena minister's son evades arrest
content: The Bombay High Court sharply questioned the Maharashtra government's adherence to the rule of law, asking if the Chief Minister was too "helpless" to act against a minister whose son has evaded arrest for weeks. The court's remarks came after the police failed to apprehend the minister's son following the rejection of his pre-arrest bail plea.

title: South Korea AI law: Startups fear regulatory risk; Government targets global AI lead
content: South Korea has launched the AI Basic Act, the world's first comprehensive legal framework for artificial intelligence, aiming to become a global AI powerhouse. While the law mandates human oversight in high-impact areas and clear AI-generated content labeling, local startups express concerns about "regulatory risk" stifling innovation, despite a one-year grace period for compliance.

title: WPL: Sophie Devine stars! Gujarat Giants crush UP Warriorz by 45 runs
content: Sophie Devine's stellar all-round performance, featuring an unbeaten 50 and two wickets, powered Gujarat Giants to a dominant 45-run victory over UP Warriorz.  After posting 153/8, the Giants' disciplined bowling attack, spearheaded by Rajeshwari Gayakwad's three wickets, restricted UP to 108, ending a three-match losing streak and propelling Gujarat to second in the WPL standings.

title: Handshake row returns: Pakistan takes dig at India ahead of T20 World Cup ‚Äì Watch
content: Pakistan's T20 series promo against Australia subtly reignites the handshake controversy with India. A video suggests a tourist forgot to shake hands, implying they learned this from India. This comes after Indian players previously avoided handshakes with Pakistani counterparts following terror attacks. The series is a build-up to the T20 World Cup.

title: Gracie Hunt hints at how she‚Äôs coping with Chiefs‚Äô tough season
content: The Kansas City Chiefs‚Äô billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has been a constant presence on the field as she has stayed by the team‚Äôs side through all the good and bad days. While the Kansas City Chiefs have had a pretty disappointing end in the ongoing season, the 26 year old billionaire heiress has hinted at how she has been coping with it.

title: Fortnite skins and K-pop superstars Demon Hunters earn Oscar nomination for song 'Golden'
content: Netflix's animated hit, KPop Demon Hunters, has earned two Oscar nominations for Best Animated Feature and Best Original Song. The film, released in June 2025, follows K-pop stars Rumi, Mira, and Zoey as they secretly battle demons using music. Its nominated song, "Golden," plays during a crucial scene revealing a major plot twist.

title: Cardi B‚Äôs IG live 'B-word' comment sparks uproar as father says 4-year-old NFL fan got death threats
content: A viral NFL picks series featuring a 4-year-old took a dark turn after missed playoff predictions. Her father says the family received death threats and money demands from angry gamblers. The situation escalated further after a profanity-laced Instagram Live comment from Cardi B, drawing wider attention to the backlash.

title: Explained: How BMC mayor is elected; quota, lottery, voting and the power play behind Mumbai‚Äôs top civic post
content: Mumbai's BMC mayoral race is a high-stakes political battle for control of Asia's richest civic body, extending beyond the ceremonial post. A fractured 2026 election mandate has forced uneasy allies BJP and Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena into intense negotiations, with real power residing in key committees.

title: From saas-bahu to Sussex: Beckhams and Meghan Markle play the same script
content: This is why the ongoing Beckham family fallout and the long, slow implosion of Meghan Markle‚Äôs relationship with the British Royal Family belong in the same analytical universe. Not because one involves footballers and fashion designers while the other involves crowns and castles, but because both are stories about institutions mistaking themselves for families, families mistaking discipline for love, and younger generations refusing to accept that inheritance must come with silence as its price.

title: Actor-producer files Rs 40 lakh cheating complaint against Palaash Muchhal in Sangli
content: A 34-year-old actor and producer has approached the police in Maharashtra‚Äôs Sangli district, alleging that he was cheated of Rs 40 lakh by composer and filmmaker Palaash Muchhal. Police confirmed on Thursday that no First Information Report (FIR) has been registered so far in the matter.

title: 'World‚Äôs biggest flop family': Assam CM Himanta takes dig at Gandhis; claims he is 'victim' of Rahul-Priyanka rift
content: Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma claims he was a "victim" of a rift between Rahul and Priyanka Gandhi during his Congress tenure. He also accused Assam Congress president Gaurav Gogoi and his wife of having links with Pakistan's ISI, emphasizing national security concerns.

title: RCB sale: Adar Poonawalla to place 'strong bid'; confirms plan to buy IPL franchise
content: Serum Institute of India CEO Adar Poonawalla is preparing a strong bid to acquire the Indian Premier League's Royal Challengers Bengaluru franchise. This follows Diageo's decision to put RCB up for sale after their maiden IPL title win in 2025. The franchise, a fan favorite, has a rich history and has seen legendary players grace its ranks.

title: Who has highest batting average in Test history? Short answer: It‚Äôs not Bradman
content: Born 105 years ago, Andy Ganteaume etched his name in cricket history with a solitary Test century for the West Indies. His debut 112 against England in 1948, in front of his home crowd, remains his only international innings. This remarkable feat propelled him to a Test batting average of 112, surpassing even Sir Don Bradman's legendary record.

title: You‚Äôre 'not addicted' to screen: What is doomscrolling and why it feels impossible to stop?
content: Late-night scrolling through distressing news, known as doomscrolling, is a stress response, not a lack of discipline. Our brains, wired for survival, interpret constant negative information as a threat, leading to anxiety and sleep issues. Understanding this helps shift focus from self-blame to managing stress and practicing digital hygiene for peace

title: T20 WC: 'If he takes off, India take off'- Shastri, Pietersen back Abhishek to dominate
content: Former India coach Ravi Shastri believes young batter Abhishek Sharma is key to India's T20 World Cup success, stating, "If he takes off, India take off." Ex-England star Kevin Pietersen also lauded Abhishek as a "proper star" and highlighted South Africa's Dewald Brevis as another impactful player for the upcoming tournament.

title: 'Europe looks lost': Zelenskyy says Ukraine can defend Greenland; why he mentioned Groundhog Day
content: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy criticized Europe's delayed response to security threats at the World Economic Forum, lamenting a lack of decisive action and a failure to build its own defense capabilities. He contrasted this with perceived US action, questioning Europe's will to pursue justice and hold Russia accountable for its war

title: ‚ÄòMaduro in jail, but not Putin‚Äô: Zelenskyy suggests Russian president should be arrested
content: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy contrasted Venezuelan leader Maduro's trial with Russian President Putin's freedom, questioning why the instigator of a major European war remains at large. Zelenskyy's remarks, made at the World Economic Forum, followed Putin's suggestion to use frozen Russian assets for Ukraine's reconstruction and a Gaza ceasefire plan.

title: Trump unveils 'Board of Peace': India absent from stage; Pak's Shehbaz Sharif joins US Prez
content: Former US President Donald Trump launched his "Board of Peace" initiative at the World Economic Forum in Davos. India received an invitation to join this effort aimed at resolving global conflicts. However, India was not present on the stage during the unveiling. Several countries, including some from the Middle East and Asia, were listed as participants in the initiative.

title: Odisha conversion row: 4 held for attacking pastor; wife alleges mob forced him to drink drain water
content: Four individuals were detained in Dhenkanal, Odisha, over two weeks after a pastor was allegedly assaulted and publicly humiliated on forced conversion accusations. The pastor's wife had complained of police inaction following the January 4th incident, where a mob reportedly attacked him. Political parties have reacted strongly to the event.

title: 'Meeting was good': Trump after talks with Zelenskyy in Davos; has a message for Putin
content: US President Donald Trump met with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy at Davos, stating the talks went well. Trump conveyed a message to Russian President Vladimir Putin, urging an end to the war, which has resulted in significant casualties. Despite previous efforts, no major progress has been made in resolving the conflict.

title: Kai Cenat faces backlash after being labeled 'performative' at Paris Fashion Week
content: Kai Cenat went viral at Paris Men‚Äôs Fashion Week 2026 after a video showed him carrying a Vivet journal showcasing his fashion ideas. While some fans praised the move, others called it ‚Äúperformative,‚Äù accusing him of forcing authenticity. The clip crossed 10 million views, sparking debate and comparisons to Kanye West‚Äôs creative persona.

title: ‚ÄòCity of future‚Äô chokes: B'luru world's 2nd most congested city; rush hour traffic speed at 13.9kmph
content: Bengaluru has been ranked the world's second most congested city in 2025, a significant jump from previous years. Commuters now face an average speed of just 13.9 kmph during rush hour, losing a staggering 168 hours annually.  This alarming trend, attributed to rising vehicle numbers and stalled infrastructure, places Pune and Mumbai also among the top congested Indian cities.

title: T20 WC row: 'Concerned' Bangladesh says Mustafizur IPL snub sparked standoff
content: Bangladesh Cricket Board president Aminul Islam Bulbul has revealed that Mustafizur Rahman‚Äôs removal from an IPL team over security concerns triggered Bangladesh‚Äôs hardening stance against travelling to India for the T20 World Cup.

title: How can Budget 2026 insulate India‚Äôs growth story from Trump‚Äôs tariff war?
content: What can Union Budget 2026 do to help India deal with the negative impact of Trump‚Äôs tariff policies? Times of India Online asked economists and experts and here‚Äôs what they had to say:

title: 'Security risk situation has not changed': B'desh says no T20 WC matches in India
content: Bangladesh has reiterated that its refusal to play the upcoming World Cup in India is solely due to security concerns and is a sovereign decision. Government adviser Professor Asif Nazrul criticised the ICC for failing to address Bangladesh‚Äôs grievances, while BCB president Aminul Islam Bulbul confirmed the board‚Äôs demand for a neutral venue, insisting the team is ready to play.

title: Maverick Macron vs Top Gun Trump: French president's shades stole the show
content: In the thin Alpine air, amid the annual earnestness of the World Economic Forum, Macron looked less like a central banker and more like a man who had wandered in from a fighter jet. The memes followed instantly. Europe‚Äôs philosopher-king, suddenly recast as Maverick.

title: Can rosemary oil help regrow lost hairs? What science says
content: Hair loss drives millions toward natural fixes, and rosemary oil has emerged as a viral favorite. Fueled by TikTok testimonials and traditional wisdom, the remedy sounds promising. But behind the hype lies a complex mix of biology, limited research, and expert caution that challenges simple answers.

title: Delhi excise policy probe: Court acquits Arvind Kejriwal in ED summons case
content: A Delhi court has acquitted former Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal in two cases filed by the Enforcement Directorate. These cases stemmed from his failure to appear before the agency in connection with the Delhi excise policy probe. The ED had sought action against Kejriwal for not complying with multiple summons issued under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act.

title: 'Running beautifully': Trump says 'Board of Peace' has started work
content: President Trump unveiled his "Board of Peace" at Davos, a $1 billion initiative aimed at resolving international conflicts.  While many nations, particularly from the Middle East, have confirmed participation, key allies like Britain have expressed doubts.  The announcement follows Trump's frustration over not receiving the Nobel Peace Prize.

title: MLB trade rumors: Phillies target $7.7mn Red Sox OF for 2026 shakeup
content: Philadelphia Phillies are reportedly eyeing Boston Red Sox outfielder Jarren Duran to bolster their struggling outfield for the 2026 season. Duran offers much-needed speed, defense, and consistent offense, fitting Philadelphia's immediate needs. A potential trade involving Alec Bohm and prospects could reshape both teams, addressing Philadelphia's outfield woes while providing Boston with key pieces.

title: Startup revolution key to growth in space technology, says NRSC Director
content: Observation of earth, communication and navigation satellites are critical for agriculture, disaster management, climate monitoring, transport and digital services, says Dr. Prakash Chauhan

title: Woman, paramour held for ‚Äòmurdering‚Äô husband in Guntur district
content: The woman allegedly served her husband biryani laced with sleeping pills before smothering him with a pillow, say police

title: Command control centre at Dr. NTRUHS to monitor exams in A.P. medical colleges
content: Authorities can monitor the examinations at 37 medical colleges in the State from this facility, says Health Minister

title: PM Modi speaks to Brazil's Lula, says ties key for interests of Global South
content: The two leaders reaffirmed their commitment to further strengthen the India-Brazil Strategic Partnership and take it to even greater heights in the year ahead, the statement said

title: Census 2027 first phase to have 33 questions
content: The questions include Census house number, material of floor of the house, whether the head of the household belongs to a Scheduled Caste/Scheduled Tribe, main source of drinking water, and access to toilet

title: A.P., Telangana discuss student development initiatives
content: APSCHE Chairman K. Madhu Murthy and TGCHE Chairman V. Balakista Reddy discuss promoting research and innovation and fostering institutional partnerships

title: Portal to regularise violation of land use norms operational: Minister
content: Minister for Revenue K. Rajan said people could apply through the www.klarc.kerala.gov.in portal from Friday.

title: Eknath Shinde should support Uddhav Thackeray in BMC, says Sena (UBT) leader
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) has 65 seats in BMC. Eknath Shinde has 29 seats. The magic figure for power in BMC is 114.

title: At global meet, CEC Gyanesh¬†Kumar offers ECINet model to help fight election misinformation
content: On the second day of the International Conference on Democracy and Election Management, Gyanesh Kumar noted that the heads of various poll management bodies had shared their concerns during the conference on the threat of misinformation to democracy

title: Interfaith couple hacked to death in Moradabad
content: The woman‚Äôs brothers were opposed to the interfaith relationship, and confessed to killing the couple

title: PM Modi to launch development projects in Thiruvananthapuram city on  Friday
content: Projects span key sectors, including rail connectivity, urban livelihoods, science and innovation, citizen-centric services, and advanced health-care

title: Why ‚Äòillegal immigration‚Äô was not cited as reason for SIR, Supreme Court asks EC
content: SC says poll body seemed to been referring more to inter-State migration and not cross-border illegal movement to conduct the SIR; verification of citizenship was not needed if an elector had moved from one State to another

title: India absent as Trump rolls out his Board of Peace with 19 countries in attendance
content: The U.S. President‚Äôs attempt to create momentum for a project to map out a future of the war-torn Gaza Strip has been overshadowed this week, first by his threats to seize Greenland, then by a dramatic retreat from that push

title: Centre permits State to procure 1.01 lakh tonnes of Bengal gram
content: Union Minister for Agriculture Shivraj Singh Chouhan asccuses State government of failing to meet procurement targets of toor dal and tothapuri mango

title: Congress high command asks Punjab leaders to refrain from speaking publicly on party‚Äôs internal issues
content: Indiscipline and groupism will not be tolerated, the party says, adding it‚Äôs committed to providing due representation to marginalised sections

title: CPI(M) demands increase in rearing cost of broiler chicken
content: He calls for the government to convene a meeting of broiler chicken farmers, poultry companies, and the Animal Husbandry Department

title: Prayagraj mela administration serves another notice to protesting seer
content: Authorities accuse Swami Avimukteshwaranand of breaking a bridge barrier, using a chariot without permission, and creating law-and-order problems; threaten to cancel his land allotment, bar him from mela

title: SCR seeks rationalisation of power tariff in A.P. to ease burden on Railways
content: Traction tariff is higher by up to ‚Çπ3.40 per unit in the State compared to the charges in 14 other States, says railway official at APERC‚Äôs public hearing

title: Congress MP‚Äôs nephew ‚Äòkills wife in accidental firing, then shoots himself‚Äô
content: Police said that after she was declared dead, Yashrajsinh, unable to bear the shock, shot himself with the same firearm while his mother and the medics watched

title: DRDO to showcase hypersonic missile, advanced submarine technologies on Republic Day
content: The Long Range Anti-Ship Hypersonic Missile (LR-AShM), a first-of-its-kind system, features fully indigenous avionics and advanced sensor packages, underscoring India‚Äôs self-reliance, the Union Ministry of Defence states

title: Madras High Court to hear cash-for-jobs case against Minister K.N. Nehru on January 23
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan would be hearing the writ petition filed by AIADMK MP I.S. Inbadurai

title: Union Finance Minister Sitharaman assures to review tax hike on unmanufactured tobacco
content: A¬†delegation of Flue-Cured Virginia tobacco farmers meets the Union Finance Minister and expresses concern over the adverse impact of 18% hike on farmers and regulated FCV tobacco ecosystem

title: Nicobar Tribal Council says it is being pressured to sign ‚Äòsurrender certificate‚Äô for ancestral tribal lands
content: The Great Nicobar Island mega project includes forest lands where the Nicobarese lived before the 2004 tsunami; ‚ÄúIt is our ancestral tribal land. We will have nothing for the future generations,‚Äù says Council member

title: Govt. medical college teachers‚Äô forum to intensify protest
content: KGMCTA holds dharna and protest meetings in all government medical colleges and in front of Directorate of Medical Education office

title: Andhra Pradesh emerging as a hub for technology, investment and innovation, says Lokesh in Davos
content: Appeals to  Accenture to establish a Global Delivery Centre in Visakhapatnam, announces that Andhra Pradesh will host South Asia‚Äôs most powerful quantum computer by July 2026

title: Over 20,000 private schools in Karnataka have violated norms, did not get recognition renewal
content: Government moves to relax four key rules, including submission of land conversion documents, to facilitate RR renewal of schools.

title: Jagan spreading lies on land reforms, says Revenue Minister Satya Prasad
content: Drawing a comparison between the passbooks brought out by the YSRCP government¬†and the ones introduced¬†by the NDA dispensation, he says the revised passbooks have the State emblem and over 15 security features

title: Amrit Bharat trains offer little value to Kerala: rail passengers body
content: Rail passengers body argues that the services neither primarily serve the State nor offer speed or value for money

title: Uttar Pradesh voters may get to skip SIR hearings, send representatives instead
content: Voters would have the option of uploading their documents on EC website and then send their representative with an authorisation letter, which can include local booth level agents (BLAs) appointed by political parties; an order to this effect might be issued this week, as per sources

title: Chilli, palm oil fetch record prices this season, says Agriculture Minister Atchannaidu
content: Crop diversification by farmers and proactive government measures have resulted in steady and remunerative prices, he says

title: IndiGo flight disruptions: Delhi High Court asks IndiGo to file affidavit on refund, compensation
content: The counsel for the low-cost air carrier told a Bench of Chief Justice D.K. Upadhyaya and Justice Tejas Karia that refund for the cancelled flights had been processed, and compensation was also being offered in terms of the civil aviation requirements for cancellation of flights

title: Lokesh, Revanth stress cooperative approach for Telugu States‚Äô development
content: They discuss education reforms, IT development, and skill-building initiatives in the two States, on the sidelines of  Davos meet

title: Speaker at UoH faces student backlash for ‚Äòhomosexuality is unnatural‚Äô comment
content: "I stand by what I said. You may disagree," says renowned author and Nari Shakti Puraskar recipient Neerja Madhav

title: Kisan drone service now accessible through mobile app, says agriculture official
content: It marks a major step in the digital transformation of agriculture, says Agriculture Director Manazir Jeelani Samoon

title: Kozhikode Corporation‚Äôs Re-VERSE drive urges plastic-free practices at KLF
content: ‚ÄãAs part of the campaign, Mayor urges visitors to avoid single-use plastic bottles and carry steel water bottles, reusable cups and towels

title: Watch: The Amit Shah playbook: Rebuilding NDA in Tamil Nadu | Focus Tamil Nadu
content: In election-bound Tamil Nadu, Union Home Minister Amit Shah has pulled off what many thought was unthinkable‚Äîbringing together sworn rivals, the AIADMK and its splinter group, the AMMK. In doing so, he has not only rebuilt a fractured NDA in Tamil Nadu but also strengthened it ahead of the elections. How did this happen?

title: Modi should explain Indore tragedy: Binoy Viswam
content: In an open letter to the Prime Minister, the CPI  State secretary  says Modi should explain how the man-made tragedy was allowed to happen at Indore in Madhya Pradesh, where a ‚Äòtriple-engine administration‚Äô is in power

title: Pilgrim killed in leopard attack at M.M. Hills; ‚Çπ5 lakh relief given

title: Strike disrupts private bus services in Vadakara
content: The strike was called by a section of bus operators in Kozhikode, protesting the delay in the arrest of a suspect involved in the attack on a conductor on the Vadakara‚ÄìThottilpalam route

title: Nirmala Lakshman recalls Periyar‚Äôs contribution to Vaikom Satyagraha
content: Ms. Lakshman, the author of The Tamils: A Portrait of a Community, said Periyar felt deeper issues needed to be addressed.

title: IAF‚Äôs ‚ÄòSindoor‚Äô formation to lead Republic Day flypast
content: The flypast will carry the flag of Operation Sindoor, commemorating India‚Äôs decisive military response from May 7 to May 10 following the Pahalgam terror attack

title: Barnwell sorts out the wide receiver market: 20 free agents, trade targets and cut candidates
content: the 49ers are competing for a trip to the super bowl this weekend in the NFC Championship Game . the two most productive wideouts in football are the Rams ' Puka Nacua and the Seahawks' Jaxon Smith-Njigba .

title: The Hall of Fame has a starting pitcher problem. Here's what it means for today's aces
content: CC Sabathia is the only starting pitcher voted into the Hall of Fame this decade . the 2010s saw a spate of starters enshrined, a group composed largely of the last of the greats who were used in a more or less traditional fashion .

title: How to reach the UCL knockouts: Can Chelsea, Bar√ßa avoid the playoff round?
content: the knockout rounds of the 2025-26 UEFA champions league are fast approaching . the final matchweek of the league phase must be played, and the stakes could hardly be higher for some of the continent's biggest clubs . liverpool , barcelona , chelsea and manchester city also competing for top eight spots .

title: Midseason report card: Cooper Flagg 'better than advertised'
content: Cooper Flagg is the youngest player in NBA history to surpass 40 points in a game . he is expected to be the rare no. 1 pick who gets playoff experience right away . the mavs are 18-26 and in 12th place in the Western Conference .

title: Would the Raiders trade the No. 1 pick? Will the Chiefs go RB?
content: Mel Kiper Jr. breaks down why the Raiders would benefit from drafting Fernando Mendoza as the no. 1 pick in the 2026 draft . the rest of the top 10 also offers intrigue . how can the Titans best support quarterback Cam Ward at no. 4?

title: MLB offseason grades: Mets get their ace in blockbuster deal for Peralta
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . if it's a big-money free agent signing that changes the course of your team's future, check back in for the freshest analysis through spring training .

title: 10 must-see WNBA games for the 2026 season
content: the WNBA released its 2026 regular-season schedule on friday . the league will tip off its 30th season on may 8 . at the top of the list is a new CBA . a moratorium on league business as negotiations continue .
